## JSON\_SCHEMA\_KEY variable

Metadata key used to set or retrieve repository JSON Schema

**Signature:**

```typescript
JSON_SCHEMA_KEY: MetadataAccessor<{
    [key: string]: JsonSchema;
}, ClassDecorator>
```
